narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Gilchrist Hospice Care Inc. is a Hospice, Inpatient provider based in Towson, MD. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $60.7M in Medicaid payments across 13K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $60.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
